Name: Prego
Review Text: Very nice food and reasonably priced for a city centre restaurant. The owner was very welcoming and it had a homely feel. I will definitely return.

Name: Prego
Review Text: They are very, very slow serving.  The first course takes an hour and a half.  They were wrong in the account and overcharged for a dish that I did not ask for.  I do not recommend it desperate

Name: Prego
Review Text: They missed part of the order, were slow and never asked if we wanted to have another drink. Quality of food was very good though

Name: Prego
Review Text: Nice subtle atmosphere. Location is so wonderful. Very decent food and lovely friendly service.

Name: Prego
Review Text: Amazing wine and a great experience! The wine especially was very good! We had a lot of fun and will definitely be back!!

Name: Prego
